TopicTitle: Rotate a part without rotating the parts that are attached?

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to do this in the VAB?

I have taken to editing the JSON file for the craft and can change the rotation by editing the fields localrotation and userrotation.  But this also breaks symmetry on all the connected parts.  So I can not easily add anything afterwards.

I am faced with a long rebuild time if I have to manually rotate because my wings and a lot of carefully placed hydrogen tanks are connected to the part in question.
